title: Draw
text: Draw and label the sides of the triangle to get a better idea of what is going on.

title: Identify and Name
text: We are looking for the third side of the triangle and we can name it "x"

title: Translate
text: We know that all three sides of the triangle add up to 48 so we have $$48=18+22+x$$

title: Solve
text: Isolate x by subtracting $$18+22$$ from both sides of the equation
